info.name: Test API
info.description:
This is the API with all the testing  endpoints

We have four entities so far, namely

- Company
- Candidate
- Jobs
- Admin

Now in each of the following we have several endpoints, each in their individual folder

request.description: Use this endpoint to create a company
This endpoint can be used to get all the jobs of a particular company

response.name: Get All the Jobs - Successful (but empty)

request.description: This is used to login to the company

response.name: Get Company Information - Successful

request.description: Used to login to the service
Use this endpoint to apply for the job
This endpoint can be used to get all the jobs applied for

response.name: Get all Jobs applied - Successsful

request.description: This endpoint is used to get the status of the job
Use this endpoint in case of Forgot Password
Use this endpoint to validate token
Get all the jobs on the platform
Get the name, email and phone_number of a candidate
This endpoint is used to create a Job for a particular company
Use this endpoint to delete job. Done using active field.
This endpoint is used to populate the questions to be asked for that job
This endpoint is used to hire candidate
This endpoint is to submit answers to Video questions. We need to upload to a S3 bucket

item.name: Get All Questions For A Job

request.description:
Use this endpoint to add questions.

If company_id is specified, it becomes company specific
This endpoint is to add standard question bank questions

response.name: Only Standard Question Bank

request.description: This endpoint is used to create an Admin
This endpoint is used to login as Admin
